resources.string:
My name is Jessica MacDonald.
 I am in web and mobile app development at NBCC.
 I live in Dieppe with my boyfriend of 5 years, Jake.
 I am the NBCC Moncton Student Union President, and I am
 incredibly excited to graduate so I can start my 
 life as a developer, get a house, het a dog and settle down.
